info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 5:57PM CDT until June 30 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN SALINE AND SOUTHEASTERN HAMILTON COUNTIES... At 555 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Galatia, or 9 miles northwest of Harrisburg, moving northeast at 30 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR GALATIA ILLINOIS. HAZARD...Baseball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. Baseball size hail was reported just north of Pittsburg. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Harrisburg, Eldorado, Galatia, Raleigh, Broughton and Muddy. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
